isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - AUTOMATIC DRAIN VALVE (DV-2)

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The DV-2 automatic drain valve ( Figure 6 ) ejects moisture and contaminants from the reservoir to which it is connected. It operates automatically and requires no manual assistance or control lines.
The automatic drain valve mounts either in the bottom of the reservoir, using the top port of the drain valve, or in the end of an end drain reservoir, using the side port of the valve.
For vehicles operating in subfreezing temperatures, the valve may include an integral heater and thermostat.
